title: Day 15 - Learned about Blender and Cryptocurrency
content:
• Today I learned about sculpting in Blender and it was the most difficult and time-consuming task for me. It included sculpting a human face, and an animal. In this part, everything learned till now came to use. It was a tiring task but I am happy that I completed the course and now I have more knowledge about Blender than before.
  • Today I watched the sixth and last episode of Cryptocurrency Investing Masterclass. It talks about the future of cryptocurrency in India. It also talked about the taxation on money made by crypto investing. The whole series was easy to follow and gave all the necessary information to start one's crypto journey.
author: Aarush Popli
